content: this is a crochet pattern for a pokemon driftloon keychain this pdf contains the written pattern for the driftloon as well as photo tutorials for any tricky parts you may encounter while creating this keychain recommended skill level beginner stitches used slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet chain mini puff explained in pattern techniques magic_ring invisible decrease working in back loops only joining body parts together sewing on details materials used 2mm hook tapestry or sewing needle stuffing stitch markers scissors/thread cutter 2 5-3 5 yarn white red chain links ~6mm keychain glue please feel free to message me with any questions you might have
